references.paper_title: No-regret algorithms in non-truthful auctions with budget and ROI constraints
references.reason: This paper addresses a similar problem of maximizing rewards under constraints, offering insights into algorithm design and regret minimization strategies.

references.paper_title: Bandits with concave rewards and convex knapsacks
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces the bandit with knapsacks problem, setting the stage for research on bandits with more general constraints.

references.paper_title: An algorithm with nearly optimal pseudo-regret for both stochastic and adversarial bandits
references.reason: This paper addresses the challenge of designing algorithms that perform well under both stochastic and adversarial reward settings, providing a foundation for handling uncertainty in the constraints.
This paper introduces the well-studied bandits with knapsacks problem, which is a special case of the problem considered in the current paper and its solution provides crucial insights.

references.paper_title: Learning in repeated auctions with budgets: Regret minimization and equilibrium
